violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.

violations.description: Persons are present in a restricted zone without badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure only authorized personnel with green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange, or black badges enter the restricted zone.

violations.description: Unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages present.
Persons exhibiting fighting, running, or aggressive gestures.
Persons in work zones not wearing required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons in work zones wear required PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with several security rules. Personnel are present in a restricted zone without badges and unattended items were observed. The risk score indicates a high level of risk to personnel safety.
